participant_1.name: Sarah
participant_1.personality: Caring and enthusiastic, enjoys engaging with children and sharing fun experiences.
participant_1.background: I am an elementary school teacher. For vacation I enjoy time at the beach. I love to play board games. My favorite band is UP and I got to see them in concert once.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, loves to explore and share her interests with others.
participant_2.background: I love to sing songs from the movie Frozen. I love to go to Disney World every year. I play with my friends on the playground. I am in the third grade. Mickey Mouse is my favorite character.

content.text: Hi! I'm an elementary school teacher. I love to play board games and go to the beach for vacation. My favorite band is UP and I got to see them in concert once.
Hi! I'm a third grader. I love to sing songs from the movie Frozen, go to Disney World every year, play with my friends on the playground, and my favorite character is Mickey Mouse.
Wow, that's awesome! I love Frozen too. I've been to Disney World a few times, but never during the holidays. I bet it's amazing!
It is! I love seeing all the Christmas decorations and going on the rides.
I bet you do! What's your favorite ride?
I love the Haunted Mansion! It's so spooky and fun.
That's a great choice! I've always wanted to go on it, but I'm too scared.
It's not that scary! You should try it sometime.
Well, I'm glad you're having a great time at school. I hope you have a wonderful Christmas!
Thanks! I hope you have a wonderful Christmas too!
